refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [sim, outlist, Success] = ld_DisassembleData2(sim, events, in, inBytes, MaxinBytes, ByteOfs, outsizes, outtypes)

para.para: disassemble the binary representation of the input, which is of type ORTD.DATATYPE_BINARY
inBytes * (INT32) - number of valid input bytes
MaxinBytes - Number of maximal input bytes (determines the size of in)
ByteOfs * (INT32) - ofset at which the disassembly takes place (index starts at 0)
Success (INT32) - if the Disassebly could successfully be performed
